de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.net
Class TCPClient

java.lang.Object
  de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.net.TCPClient

public class TCPClient
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the network capabilities required by a game client

Request und server replies will automatically checked for correctness according to the protocol specification.

Exceptions of type StatusError and ProtocolError will be thrown, if malformed packages are detected.

Method Detail

sanitize

public static java.lang.String sanitize(java.lang.String string)
To ensure charaters entered by players only contains valid characters every non-valid charater has to be removed from the string entered. Given any input string, this function will return a copy in which all occurances of non-valid characters have been replaced by the character _

Parameters:
string - The string to be transformed
Returns:
The string with all non-valid characters replaced with _

getGameOwnerKey

public java.lang.String getGameOwnerKey()

splitBrace

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> splitBrace(java.lang.String string)
Split a string containing of components contained in pairs of opening and closing braces into individual parts with leading and trailing braces removed. i.e. the string "[a[bc]][de]" will be split into parts "a[bc]" and "de"

Parameters:
string - The string to be split
Returns:
A list of the parts enclosed in matching pairs of braces

splitBrace

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> splitBrace(java.lang.String string,
                                                          boolean strip)
Split a string containing of components contained in pairs of opening and closing braces into individual parts either leaving matching pairs of braces in place or stripping them.

Parameters:
string - The string to be split
strip - If set to true braces will be stripped. Braces will be left in place otherwise.
Returns:
A list of the parts enclosed in matching pairs of braces

Parameters:
string - The string to search
key - The key to search for
Returns:
The first corresponding value, if it is found, null otherwise.

parseIntTable

public static int[][] parseIntTable(java.lang.String string)
Parse a 2 dimensional array of int values from a string consisting of a sequence of row descriptions enclosed in braces. Each row description of the input string hast to consist of a string representation of the stored int values enclosed in braces.

Parameters:
string - The string to convert
Returns:
The Array consisting of the values extracted from the string

Parameters:

Returns:
The reply sent by the server
Throws:

chat

public void chat(java.lang.String playerId,
                 java.lang.String targetPlayerId,
                 java.lang.String targetGameId,
                 java.lang.String messageString)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 StatusError,
                 ProtocolError
Send a chat message, either to a specific game or to a specific player

Parameters:
playerId - The id of the player performing the request
targetPlayerId - The id of the player to send this message to, null if no specific player should be targetet.
gameId - The id of the game to send this message to, null if no specific game should be targetet.
messagge - The message to send
Throws:
StatusError - The server reply reports an error in the previous transmission
ProtocolError - The reply does not conform to the protocol specification
java.io.IOException
